QueueableWithoutFinalizer.description:
Description

Detects when the Queueable interface is used but a Finalizer is not attached.
It is best practice to call theSystem.attachFinalizer(Finalizer f)method within theexecutemethod of a class which implements theQueueableinterface.
Without attaching a Finalizer, there is no way of designing error recovery actions should the Queueable action fail.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
QueueableWithoutFinalizer.option: This rule has no specific options.
